title: Brilliant Dark
description: In the sequel to Summer Snow, Winter Sun, things have taken a dark turn for Molly. After discovering her true identity, she finds herself spiraling in a pit of despair and confusion. Winter in South Haven is long and sunless, and it isn't just the season of summer that has gone missing. Her mysterious friend Summer Snow has gone missing, too - leaving Molly to contend with her emotions without guidance. But when she meets Christian, a brooding, sexy, something-like-her, things start looking up. It couldn't get any worse, could it?
author: Heather     Leigh
